AMCO CORPORATE

About AMCO

AMCO Apparel Manufacturing Company is the leading Apparel manufacturing company from United Arab Emirates, near the dynamic city of Dubai. For the past 5 decades we have been the manufacturing partners for known apparel brands from USA and EUROPE. We are serving our customers with a complete apparel manufacturing solution from sourcing of raw materials to finished goods. Having a comprehensive in-house set up, best labor practices, ISO, WRAP, SEDEX, GRS and OCS certified production facility, in addition we are able to offer shorter lead time than Asia due to our geographically central location and produce a high quality product in terms of all respects.

Our Services

Merchandising

Merchandising is an integral part of the sourcing cycle. Our merchandising team is committed to complete customer satisfaction.

Sourcing

Proper sourcing is the key to success in the apparel business. Keeping this in mind, AMCO sources products from reliable vendors with a careful assessment of price and quality over the years

Sampling

Our sampling department is a very critical part of our company as every sample we produce is the first step to satisfying our customers.

Production

The success of AMCO is primarily because of the system that has been placed at all stages of the production process.

Embroidery & Printing

For a professional appearance, finest quality and the highest perceived value- Embroidery is the number one choice in garment decorating. Embroidery on the apparels can include text and graphics.

Quality Assurance

At AMCO, we are committed to quality requirements of the highest standard. We make sure quality is adhered to throughout our operations from sampling to final shipment.

Products

Outer Wear

We manufacture all styles in outerwear which include fleece jackets, wind breakers, sports jacket/trousers, bomber jackets, puffer vest, quilted jackets, anorak, varsity jackets, heavy duty parka jackets, lightwear and mid weight jackets.

Sportswear

Our Sportswear and Activewear range are produced with the best fabrics to ensure comfort and utility while doing any sport or physical exercise. Our product range includes tracksuits, track pants, team jackets, shorts, T-shirts and polo shirts.

Workwear

Workwear is the main uniforms for the industrial sector. We source our fabric from reliable suppliers to ensure quality. We have been producing fleece wear in all kinds of coverall, vest, 2pc coverall, multi-pocket shirts, cargo and shirt.

Workwear

Workwear is the main uniforms for the industrial sector. We source our fabric from reliable suppliers to ensure quality. We have been producing fleece wear in all kinds of coverall, vest, 2pc coverall, multi-pocket shirts, cargo and shirt.

From CEO

It is my pleasure to introduce AMCO as the leading apparel manufacturing company from United Arab Emirates, near the dynamic city of Dubai.

For the past 5 decades we have been the manufacturing partners for known apparel brands from USA and EUROPE. We are serving our customers with a complete apparel manufacturing solution from sourcing of raw materials to finished goods.

Having a comprehensive in-house set up, best labor practices, ISO certified production facility, we are able to offer shorter lead time than Asia and produce a high quality product in terms of all respects.

In today's world, competition has reached to its peak. Customers need products that go beyond their expectations in terms of product quality, competitive pricing, timely delivery and most importantly hassle-free communication.

At AMCO, we are a team of dedicated professionals, who work with targeted goals and objectives enabling us to deliver the right products at the right time, at the right place and at the right price.

HAMMAD ANWAR
CEO, AMCO
